Tool

NameSHALSTAB
ID2
AuthorA. Günther (c) 2012
Specificationgrid

Description

This module is a realization of the SHALSTAB (Shallow Slope Stability) model from Montgomery & Dietrich (1994). The model computes grid cell critical shallow groundwater recharge values (CR in mm/day) as a measure for relative shallow slope stability, utilizing a simple model that combines a steady-state hydrologic model (a topographic wetness index) to predict groundwater pressures with an infinite slope stability model. For computation, a slope (in radians) and a catchment area (in m2) grid are required. Additionally, information on material density (g/cm3), material friction angle (°), material hydraulic conductivity (m/hr), bulk cohesion (MPa) and depth to potential shear plane (m) are required that can be specified either globally or through grids. The module produces a continuous CR (mm/day) raster with unconditionally stable cells blanked, and unconditionally unstable cells as CR = 0. Optionally, a classified CR grid can be calculated representing seven stability classes. Reference: Montgomery D. R., Dietrich, W. E. (1994) A physically based model for the topographic control on shallow landsliding. Water Resources Research, 30, 1153-1171..

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Input
Slope grid (rad) Grid (input)A
Catchment area grid (m2) Grid (input)BA catchment area grid (in square meters)
Min Density grid (g/cm3) (*)Grid (optional input)CminA grid representing minimum material density (in g/cm3)
Max Density grid (g/cm3) (*)Grid (optional input)CmaxA grid representing maximum material density (in g/cm3)
Min Hydraulic conductivity grid (m/hr) (*)Grid (optional input)DminA grid representing minimum material hydraulic conductivity (in m/hr)
Max Hydraulic conductivity grid (m/hr) (*)Grid (optional input)DmaxA grid representing maximum material hydraulic conductivity (in m/hr)
Min Thickness grid (m) (*)Grid (optional input)EminA grid representing minimum material thickness (in m)
Max Thickness grid (m) (*)Grid (optional input)EmaxA grid representing maximum material thickness (in m)
Min Friction angle grid (degree) (*)Grid (optional input)FminA grid representing minimum material friction angle (in degrees)
Max Friction angle grid (degree) (*)Grid (optional input)FmaxA grid representing maximum material friction angle (in degrees)
Min Bulk cohesion grid (MPa) (*)Grid (optional input)JminA grid representing minimum bulk cohesion
Max Bulk cohesion grid (MPa) (*)Grid (optional input)JmaxA grid representing maximum bulk cohesion
Output
CR valuesGrid (output)GResulting critical recharge (m/day) grid
CR classes (*)Grid (optional output)HClassified critical recharge (-) grid

Global minimum density (g/cm3)Floating pointfCminConstant value if no raster setDefault: 1.600000
